bibl.title: More Early Christian Inscribed Tombstones from el-Huweinat in Northern Sinai.
bibl.note: 10 épitaphes chrétiennes provenant de la nécropole d'el-Huweinat (Sinaï).

bibl.title: Man near a Roman Arch. Studies Presented to Professor Yoram Tsafrir.

bibl.seg: Uzi Dahari & Leah Di Segni, More Early Christian Inscribed Tombstones from el-Huweinat in Northern Sinai.
